divs: Sighting Detailsme and my family went on vacation on ohrid lake.Our friends had rented a house so we went to visit them my family and the friends were sitting on a table near the house.I went to the garage to see whats inside when i came out i saw a flying saucer over the trees the house was far from other houses so it was all trees around us no lights and glowing stuff.so i saw this orange flying saucer over the trees coming down it was far away not that far away i saw it it was big and landing it was over the trees so in about 3 seconds it was behind them somewhere.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ohrid
This sighting has never been favorited.
